name: SpaceCaveman
description:
Better than 2001 a Space Odyssey, bigger than Gravity, stronger than Star Citizen, here is SpaceCaveman!

Controls:
WASD to use your JETPACK
Mouse to look around

Made for Ludum Dare #36
